subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers defied conventional wisdom at the N.H.L. draft, using their first-round pick, the 10th overall, to select Dylan McIlrath, a tough Moose Jaw defenseman.
snippet: The Rangers defied conventional wisdom at the N.H.L. draft, using their first-round pick, the 10th overall, to select Dylan McIlrath, a tough Moose Jaw defenseman.
